title: Can terminate your license without notice and suspend your access to any purchased products.

tosdr.tldr: "Twitch reserves the right, without notice and in our sole discretion, to terminate your license to use the Twitch Services (including to post User Content), and to block or prevent your future access to and use of the Twitch Services. This includes the ability to terminate or to suspend your access to any purchased products or services, including any subscriptions, Twitch Prime or Turbo accounts. [...]. Your only remedy [...] is to terminate your account and to discontinue use of any and all parts of the Twitch Services.
